title: Wall Street Breakfast July 4: Eyes On Virgin Galactic, McDonald's Loyalty And Metaverse Investing
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
Our weekend preview of upcoming IPOs, earnings reports, conference presentations, investor days, IPO lockup expirations, FDA decisions, Barron's mentions, our single stock focus - Micron - and other key events that could impact stocks.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
